attributes.comment:
I am strongly opposed to the proposed increase in application fees pertaining to
adoption of an orphan. Adoption is so expensive already...At the same time, I
would like to propose that the 18 month current expiration period for a I600-A form
be lengthened....With the current wait times for adoption from China, my husband
and I will have to re-apply, be re-fingerprinted and apply for a home study update.
All of these fees will be close to another several thousand dollars. It just doesn't
seem right that we will have to do everything all over again and pay a lot more
money.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jennifer Long
